mainSequence.step: Waiter Interface requests order details from Order Management System
Order Management System fetches order items from Menu Database
Menu Database returns order items to Order Management System
Order Management System requests allergy warnings for items from Allergy Information System
Allergy Information System looks up allergy info in Menu Database
Menu Database returns allergy data to Allergy Information System
Allergy Information System compiles allergy warnings
Order Management System sends compiled warnings to Waiter Interface
Waiter Interface displays allergy warnings to Waiter
